At the start of the turn, gain 1 stack of Covenant. {Retain}. {Sacrifice}: At the end of the turn, take DMG equal to the stack number, then remove 50% of the {Sacrifice} stacks. {Sacrifice} carries over to the next battle. {Live Seal}: Each stacks increases the amount of {Birth Ritual} applied by {Princess of Delusions} by 20%. {Live Seal} can stack up to 5 times. If {Princess of Delusions} is used with 5 stacks of {Live Seal}, the amount of DMG instances increases from 5 to 10

C4.name: Waltz of Lemuria
C4.description: Gain {Keyflare} equal to (200/220/240/260/280/300%) of {Keyflare Regen}. Trigger one of the following effects, based on current Tentacle Stance. {Surging Tides}: Gain (10.5/12.6/14.7/16.8/18.9/21% {ATK}) {Tentacle DMG}. Spawn 1 Tentacle. {Tranquil Sea}: Gain (41/49.2/57.4/65.6/73.8/82% {DEF}) Shield. {Retain} 50% of remaining Shield to the next turn. {Raging Waves}: Deal (30/36/42/48/54/60% {ATK}) DMG 5 times to the enemy with the highest HP. This damage benefits from (50/55/60/65/70/75%) of your {Tentacle DMG}. {Retain}.

C5.name: Abyss Hymns
C5.description: Gain 2 Arithmetica. Draw 2 cards. Suffer {Sacrifice} equal to 5% Max HP at the start of your next turn. {Aftershock}: Remove Sacrifice stacks equal to (2.5/3/3.5/4/4.5/5%)

exalt.name: Princess of Delusions
exalt.description: Gain (32/40/56/64/72/80% {DEF}) Shield. Suffer {Sacrifice} equal to 10% Max HP at the start of the next turn. Inflict (10/11/12/13/14/15) {Birth Ritual} on all enemies. Deal (32/40/56/64/72/80% {ATK}) DMG 5 times to the enemy with the highest HP. This damage benefits from (100/110/120/130/140/150%) of your {Tentacle DMG}. {Birth Ritual}: (1% per stack) of DMG taken will also be applied as {Sacrifice} stacks. {Birth Ritual} can stack up to 75 times. {Birth Ritual} is removed at the end of the turn.

over_exalt.name: Aetherial Loop
over_exalt.description: Inflict 5 stacks of {Birth Ritual}. Create and add to your hand 3 {Waltz of Lemuria} with 2 Arithmetica Cost, with {Prepare} and {Exhaust}.

T1.name: Innate: Divine Realm's Order
T1.description: (Max level: 1) When Murphy: Fauxborn is on the team, the {Aequor} Realm ascends to {Divine Realm}: {Aequor}. {Tentacle DMG} is changed to 5% of the team's Max HP. Team {DMG Amplification} +50% after exploration begins (effect doubled if the team only has {Aequor} and/or {Chaos} Awakeners, though no additional starting Tentacles will be Spawned). Disable the Tentacle Gathering effect. {Divine Realm}: Tentacle Stance gain the following new effects: {Tranquil Sea}: Immediately gain a Shield equal to 25% Max HP. Tentacle will no longer attack at turn end. Entering this stance has a 3 turn cooldown. {Raging Waves}: {Tentacle DMG} x 125% for the turn. For each instance of Active DMG dealt, command 1 Tentacle to attack. At the end of the turn, lose 1 Tentacle. Entering this stance has a 3 turn cooldown. Gain {Divine Realm}: Aequor Mastery, scaling off your Realm Mastery. Each point of Aequor Mastery increases shield gained by Tranquil Sea by 0.025% Max HP, and increase the {Tentacle DMG} while in Raging Waves by 0.025% Max HP. This effect is doubled if the team only has {Aequor} and/or {Chaos} Awakeners.

T2.name: Madness Omen
T2.description: (Max level: 12) Obtain (5 per talent level) Aliemus after the start of exploration.

T3.name: Soulforge Aptitude
T3.description: (Max level: 10) This talent is only effective in {Astral Reign} stages. Murphy: Fauxborn's {CON}, {ATK}, and {DEF} are increased by (3% per talent level). After the first time using Murphy: Fauborn's {Rouse}, gain (50 per talent level) {Keyflare}. When Murphy: Fauxborn deals DMG, inflict Sacrifice stacks equal to 10% (+4% per talent level) of DMG dealt to the target. Covenant state's {Birth Ritual} infliction is doubled. When there are 1/2/3 other {Lemurian} Awakeners on the team, gain the following effects: Max HP +6%/15%/30%. After using an Exalt, gain a Shield equal to 50%/125%/250% of Murphy: Fauxborn's {DEF}. This effect can only occur once per turn, and does not benefit from Shield Generation Boost. Note: I believe this means the value can't be affected by {Alert} or any wheel that {increases your Shield gain} or whatever. I could be wrong though.
